I

increaseCharacterStats() - Method in class handlers.Character
The method increases the Character objects stored Stat values by the amount asserted by the instanced Race objects getRaceIncreaseStats method and getAvailableStats method.
infernalLegacy - Variable in class Races.Tiefling
 
intelligence - Variable in class handlers.Character
These Stat variables are declared to differentiate between the different stats
InvalidNameException - Exception in exceptions
 
InvalidNameException() - Constructor for exception exceptions.InvalidNameException
 
isBackGroundChosen() - Method in class handlers.Character
This method asserts through a loop that the instanced Background object is not null by instancing a scanner that runs the chooseBackground method.

isProficient - Variable in class handlers.Skill
stores the boolean on the instanced Skill object
isProficient() - Method in class handlers.Skill
returns the boolean value of the variable isProficient on the instanced Skill object.
isProficient(String) - Method in class Roles.Role
 
isRaceChosen() - Method in class handlers.Character
This method asserts through a loop that the instanced Race object is not null by instancing a scanner that runs the chooseRace method when the instanced race object is not equal to null the loop exits.
IsRoleChosen() - Method in class handlers.Character
This method asserts through a loop that the instanced Role object is not null by instancing a scanner that runs the chooseRole method when the instanced race object is not equal to null the loop exits.
